Description: Pale glazed composition shabti of Djehutyirdis with a striated lappet-wig, a modelled face with a beard and crossed hands in relief holding an adze, a hoe and the string of the seed-basket that hangs over the shoulder; the waist is inscribed with a row of Hieroglyphic text and the front of the leg section with a similar column; back-pillar and a plinth.
